author: danielf
msg: Added VirtualPipelineSerializer and VirtualPipelineTransformer and refactored the two other VPCs. New environment functionality for adding and removing the current environment in pipelines. Additions to the VirtualProcessingPipeline to support transformer and serializer. Various test cases for everything. All test cases works. Added the environment-attr to cocoon-core.xconf.
